title: iDigital
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ‘He spent every dime’: My daughter’s husband is in prison. Is she responsible for his debts?
items.description: “He opened credit cards in his name and spent every dime he could get his hands on, gambling and buying vehicles.”

items.title: The meme-stock party is already fizzling out. What that means for the rest of the market.
items.description: The meme-stock craze may have ended before it could flourish, caught up in a summer market and big tech earnings, says Vanda Research.

items.title: LangChain’s Align Evals closes the evaluator trust gap with prompt-level calibration
items.description: LangChain allows enterprises to make and calibrate a model to evaluate applications and get it close to human preferences.

items.title: ‘I told him that wouldn’t fly’: My 90-year-old mother’s adviser changed the beneficiaries on her accounts. What is going on?
